metadata.description: The harbinger of horror. The maestro of the macabre. From his remarkable life to his even more remarkable afterlife, Vincent Price has been a master of all things horror and terror for almost the full century since his birth. He's been in music videos and read the most dark and stormy of stories and he's been in every aspect of the horror genre, but now, you get to take a peek inside the coffin and will gasp in shock and awe at the story that will unfold. Come inside and take a seat, the time of your life is about to begin.
metadata.name: Vincent Price: Biography
